creditline: Lent by David and Flinnina Dewey
description: (a) standing male figure wearing an antler-like headpiece; proper R arm raised at elbow and R hand is in a fist; black robe with orange and white trim; two triangular tails at back; shoes have pointed upturned toes; (b) drum is orange with white curvilinear designs and brown edges; drum has two square cut-outs at sides; plexi mount for drum
medium: Earthenware with traces of cold-painted pigments
title: Drummer Playing a Stand Drum
